parties: New Mt. Calvary Baptist Church v. Drayton, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed; costs on appellee.
The former Mr. Chief Justice Bell and the former Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Seymore E. Johnson, Jr., for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
New Mt. Calvary Baptist Church v. Drayton, Appellant.
Argued November 15, 1971.
Before Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.

March 20, 1972:
